eg.syntax

Class SyntaxUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.syntax.SyntaxUtils

  • public class SyntaxUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static variables and methods to search for text elements

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isBorderedByQuotes(java.lang.String text, int pos, int length)
      Returns the boolean that is true if the section starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length is bordered by double or single quotes
      static boolean isInQuotes(java.lang.String text, int pos, char quoteMark)
      Returns the boolean that is true if the specified position is found inside a section of text in quotes

      Returns the boolean that indicates if the portion of text starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length is a word.

      Returns the boolean that indicates if the character that follows the specified position is a word end

      Returns the boolean that indicates if the specified position is a word start

      Returns the next position of the specified toSearch that is not preceded with a backslash
      static int nextNonSpace(java.lang.String text, int pos)
      Returns the next position, relative to the specified position, that is a space character
      static int wordLength(java.lang.String text, int pos, char[] endChars)
      Returns the length of a word that starts at the specified position and ends with one of the characters in endChars

    • Method Detail

      • isWord

        public static boolean isWord(java.lang.String text,
                             int pos,
                             int length,
                             char[] nonWordStart)
        Returns the boolean that indicates if the portion of text starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length is a word. A word is initially defined such that it does not adjoin to a letter or a digit at the start and/or the end.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        length - the length
        nonWordStart - the array of characters that do not precede a word in addition to letters and digits. Can be null
        Returns:
        the boolean value

      • isWordStart

        public static boolean isWordStart(java.lang.String text,
                                  int pos,
                                  char[] nonWordStart)
        Returns the boolean that indicates if the specified position is a word start
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        nonWordStart - the array of characters that must not precede a word, in addition to letters and digits. Can be null
        Returns:
        the boolean value
        See Also:
        isWord(String, int, int, char[])

      • isWordEnd

        public static boolean isWordEnd(java.lang.String text,
                                int pos)
        Returns the boolean that indicates if the character that follows the specified position is a word end
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        Returns:
        the boolean value
        See Also:
        isWord(String, int, int, char[])

      • wordLength

        public static int wordLength(java.lang.String text,
                             int pos,
                             char[] endChars)
        Returns the length of a word that starts at the specified position and ends with one of the characters in endChars
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        endChars - the array of characters that mark the end of a word in addition to a white space
        Returns:
        the length of the word

      • lastBlockStart

        public static int lastBlockStart(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos,
                                 java.lang.String blockStart,
                                 java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the last block start before the specified position
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the last block start. -1 if a block end is closer than a block start or if no block start is found

      • nextBlockEnd

        public static int nextBlockEnd(java.lang.String text,
                               int pos,
                               java.lang.String blockStart,
                               java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the next block end relative to the specified position
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position in the text
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the next block end. -1 if a block start is closer than a block end or if no block end is found

                                         int pos,

        Returns the boolean that is true if the section starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length is bordered by double or single quotes
        Parameters:

        pos - the position
        length - the length
        Returns:
        the boolean value

                                 char quoteMark)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • nextNonEscaped

        public static int nextNonEscaped(java.lang.String text,
                                 char toSearch,
                                 int pos)
        Returns the next position of the specified toSearch that is not preceded with a backslash
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        toSearch - the char that is searched
        pos - the position where the search starts
        Returns:
        the position

      • nextNonSpace

        public static int nextNonSpace(java.lang.String text,
                               int pos)
        Returns the next position, relative to the specified position, that is a space character
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        Returns:
        the position of the next space; the specified position itself if it is the text length
